Throws: ErrnoException containing E constants in OsConstants.
onFsync().Description: Ensures all the written data are stored in permanent storage device. For example, if it has data stored in on memory cache, it needs to flush data to storage device.

Returns: Size of bytes processed by the function.
Parameters: long: Offset in bytes from the file head specifying where to write bytes. If a seek operation is conducted on the file descriptor, then a write operation is requested, the offset refrects the proper position of requested bytes.
byte: Byte array to be written to somewhere.
Throws: ErrnoException containing E constants in OsConstants.
onWrite(long, int, byte[]).Description: Handles bytes written to file descriptor.
onWrite(long, int, byte[]).FullName: public int onWrite (long offset, int size, byte[] data)

Returns: Size of bytes returned by the function.
Parameters: long: Offset in bytes from the file head specifying where to read bytes. If a seek operation is conducted on the file descriptor, then a read operation is requested, the offset refrects the proper position of requested bytes.
byte: Byte array to store read bytes.
Throws: ErrnoException containing E constants in OsConstants.
onRead(long,int,byte[]).Description: Provides bytes read from file descriptor. It needs to return exact requested size of bytes unless it reaches file end.

ClassDesc: Callback that handles file system requests from ProxyFileDescriptor. All callback methods except for onRelease should throw @B_android#system#ErrnoException_E@ with proper errno on errors. See @B_android#system#OsConstants_E@. Typical errnos are @B_android#system#OsConstants#EIO_E@ for general I/O issues @B_android#system#OsConstants#ENOENT_E@ when the file is not found @B_android#system#OsConstants#EBADF_E@ if the file doesn't allow read/write operations based on how it was opened. (For example, trying to write a file that was opened read-only.) @B_android#system#OsConstants#ENOSPC_E@ if you cannot handle a write operation to space/quota limitations.
